message: Has anyone played with The Mathworks's Matlab Coder, which outputs C/C++ from Matlab scripts?
Heh, taking a cue from Cython it seems...
I haven't played with it, but I think people are definitely using it. Sort of Cython-lite I guess for MATLAB

I had not heard about that...I try to keep my distance from Matlab when I can!  I wonder if this would be useful for generating stand-alone binaries that will run on our cluster without the Parallel Toolbox...
